==== Notes ====

''
Ubuntu works really fine with this laptop, all visual effects are available, and so on.
what doesn't work, or makes troubles is :

Audio device : if I connect the headphones, the sound goes trough them, and the speakers are off. but if i pull them out, I must set manually to have the sound trough the speakers

Web Cam:     it is a OrbiCam, needs Suyin or Bison drivers in Windows. I think is detected different in Ubuntu , but maybe Microdia is her name. The problem is that it doesn't show colors at all, just b/w. and if I want to turn the camera around( it has the capability for turning around for 225 degrees) cheese and other applications doesn't recognize it anymore, and I can't turn it on until next restart. and isn't listed anymore with lsusb.

Video drivers: anything works, I can use all the visual effects. but the drive is detected as ATI Xpress 1100, but is detected as ATI xpress 200.''
